name: Witches Brew (itch) (wertyyytrew)
description:
Works best in full screen (press blue button in corner)!

Controls:

Each element is added in one by one, so watch out for when it starts!

Move - A + D

Stir Cauldron - SPACE

Control Temperature - W + S

Mouse - Deflect knocked objects

You're a newly appointed witch and for your anointment ceremony you have to create the perfect potion! Mix together the right ingredients at the right temperature, but beware of those mischievous cats and don't forget to give your mixture a good stir otherwise there may be consequences...

Test your multi-tasking skills in this mini potion-making game.

Programming: Ilya Phillips
Art: Rebecca Rayner
